div.p: A sketch map of the population distribution of Masked laughingthrushes showing the fragmentation of suitable habitats and the relative isolation by surrounding environments. Black areas indicate the fragmented suitable habitats, which are interlaced with small villages, paddy fields and lower hills and surrounded by Tianyu‐Qingyuan Mountain, Ganjiang River and residential area of Ji'An city. Dashed boxes illustrate the division of the 12 subpopulations and subareas. Lines with numbers show the topographic contour line of 150 m, 300 m, and 450 m of the two mountains
